com.kofhearts.safe.model

Class Password

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kofhearts.safe.model.ActiveRecord
      • com.kofhearts.safe.model.Password

  • public class Password
extends ActiveRecord
    A class that represents password of the user. Password is used to authenticate user to the Safe app.

      • getTotalCount

        public static int getTotalCount()
        Gets the total counts of passwords from the database.
        Returns:
        Number of password entries from database.

      • first

        public static Password first()
                      throws NoRecordFoundException
        Fetches the first Password entry from database.
        Returns:
        Password record
        Throws:
        NoRecordFoundException - If there are no password entries in database then this exception is thrown.

      • create

        public static long create(java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String hint)
        Creates a password entry.
        Parameters:
        email - user email
        password - user password
        hint - hint in case this password is forgotten
        Returns:
        Id of password record.

      • get

        public static Password get(long id)
                    throws NoRecordFoundException
        Fetches the password entry with given id.
        Parameters:
        id - Password entry's id
        Returns:
        fetched Password entry from database
        Throws:
        NoRecordFoundException - This exception is thrown if a password doesn't exist with given id.

      • save

        public int save()
        Saves the password entry to database. This is normally called when a password entry is updated.
        Returns:
        Total number of rows affected or row updated.

      • delete

        public int delete()
        Deletes the password from database. This method is normally called on a password object intended to be deleted.
        Returns:
        Total number of rows affected.

      • list

        public static Password[] list()
        Fetches all password entries from database.
        Returns:
        List of password entries.
